title: Nmoder Women's Casual Wrap Flared Midi Dress Wedding Guest Cocktail Tea Dresses A-Line Swing V-Neck 3/4 Sleeve
description: 【MULTIPLE SIZES & COLORS】The elegant V-neckline wrap dress has multiple colors and sizes from M-3XL for you to choose, every dress with different colors or patterns. Ladies in any sizes could choose a right one.

【COMFORTABLE MATERIALS】The 3/4 sleeve dress for women is made of 95% polyester and 5% spandex. Soft and stretchy fabric make you feel comfortable in all days and also friendly to pregnant women. 3/4 sleeve design is wearable in four seasons.

【Highlight S-Shaped Body】The V neck of fit and flare dress for women makes you look sexy. High waistband perfect to trim your waist and show your S-shaped body. Side pocket designs for carrying small items but without influencing the beauty.

【OCCASIONS & MATCH】The stylish aline dress for women is perfect to wear with pumps for semi formal occasions like wedding, cocktail, banquet or with more ornate jewelry and accessories for casual occasions like dating, dinner, party etcs.
【WHAT YOU GET】If you have any questions when purchasing the semi-formal slimming dresses for curvy women, Please contact us and we will respond within 24 hours.
